title: How I know if I take admission in IGNOU? - Quora

response.answer_text: Below are the things that you need to do to take admission at Ignou. Check the eligibility for the course. Eg for MCA eligibility should be graduation.Check if there is any entrance exam for it. Eg for MBA IGNOU conducts an entrance exam.Check the feed back on the course and study centre from seniors . Eg. Santosh Kumar Nekkanti's answer to How is the MCA from IGNOU?If you are fine, then start applying at the IGNOU admission site https://onlineadmission.ignou.ac.in/admission/Hope this helps
Please specify your study programme, you intent to pursue.
Go to https://www.ignou.ac.in Choose a course, fill the details and pay the fee of the course.
